descriptionKey:
[23c8f5]Hoth: an icy, desolate world in a remote system, and the site of a secret Rebel base. Repel an Imperial onslaught and survive to fight another day![-]

[ffcc33]Mission Bonuses: [-][23c8f5]Hoth Heroes, Rebels (See Details)[-]

[23c8f5]TIP: [-][ffcc33ff]INVITE ALLIES[-][23c8f5] to join your Guild.  Increasing Guild size is the fastest way to improve in Territory Battles[-]

zoneDefinition.descriptionKey: Enemy forces have surrounded the Base. Break through their lines to reach the Power Generator!
The v-150 Planet Defender is a formidable weapon. Secure the Ion Cannon to gain the upper hand over the Imperial fleet!
The turrets in this sector will be critical for repelling Imperial infantry--protect them!
A massive squadron of Imperial fighters and bombers have amassed to attack the Ion Cannon--rally a counterattack!
The fighting has moved to the trenches--take control of the battlefield from the Empire to launch a counterattack!
The Power Generator is the only thing keeping the Empire's orbital bombardment at bay--protect it at all costs!
The Imperial fleet is preparing to assault the ground forces, but they're unprepared for a preemptive strike!
The fighting has moved to the trenches--take control of the battlefield from the Empire to launch a counterattack!
Imperial forces have discovered the passage through the mountains on the outer edge of the battlefield!
The Imperial fleet has been scattered by the Ion Cannon's reactivation and successful counterattacks.
The Empire is attempting to rally for a renewed assault on the Rebel Base!
The turrets on this peak will be instrumental in the final attack against the Imperials!
The Imperial fleet has rallied around its capital ships--strike a decisive blow and take control of the skies!
The Imperial forces have been divided and cornered, but are making one final attempt to break through!
The final attack begins! Strike at the Imperial landing zone and drive them off for good!

reconZoneDefinitionList.rewardDescKey: Earn bonus TP for each Platoon completed.

reconZoneDefinitionList.goalDescKey: [c][b5e7f5]Reinforce[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Rear Airspace[-][/c][c][b5e7f5],[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Forward Airspace[-][/c][c][b5e7f5][-][/c],[c][F0FF23] Contested Airspace[-][/c][c][b5e7f5], and[-][/c][c][F0FF23] Imperial Fleet Staging Area[-][/c] [c][b5e7f5]with a powerful ability![-][/c]

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey:
[23C8F5]Time Limit:[-] [ff8c00]6d[-]
[23C8F5]Phases: [b5e7f5]6[-]
[23C8F5]Roster Refresh:[-] [b5e7f5]After every Phase[-]

Exclusive Rewards (earned in Special Mission):
[23C8F5]All of your Rebel Characters gain the following ability:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: At the end of this unit's turn, it gains Protection Up (30%) for 2 turns if it used a Special ability and no enemies were defeated this turn.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]All of your Hoth Hero Characters gain the following ability:[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: The first time this unit is defeated, it is Revived with Offense Up, Advantage, and the [c][ffff33]Last Stand[-][/c] unique debuff for 2 turns. ([c][ffff33]Last Stand:[-][/c] Defeated in 2 turns unless an enemy is defeated or the encounter ends; can't be Dispelled)

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The Empire has fielded a variety of seasoned soldiers well-equipped for combat in Hoth's harsh icy environment. Be on the lookout for Elite units--not only are they much stronger than normal units, but they also have powerful Elite abilities![-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and gain Critical Damage Up for 2 turns.
Snowtrooper gains 20% Turn Meter whenever any unit is defeated, and other Empire allies gain half that amount.\n\nWhile Snowtrooper is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +20% Critical Damage.
Snowtrooper (Elite) has +70% Counter Chance and his first Basic attack each turn calls one or more allies to assist, dealing 50% less damage.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 50% chance to Stun for 1 turn. This chance is doubled while Stealthed. If the target is debuffed, also remove 30% Turn Meter.
Gain Stealth for 2 turns and recover 40% Health. This ability's Cooldown is reset whenever an ally unit is defeated.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies and Dispel all buffs on them, with a 50% chance to also inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns.
While stealthed, Snowtrooper Ops (Elite)'s Basic attack deals massive damage to units with less than 70% Health.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and call a random buffed Empire ally to assist.
Empire allies gain Protection Up (10%) for 2 turns for each debuffed enemy (stacking). If no enemies are debuffed, all allies gain Offense Up and Advantage for 3 turns instead.
Grant another target ally 100% Turn Meter, Critical Chance Up and Speed Up for 3 turns.
Whenever Snowtrooper Commander falls below full Health, the healthiest ally Taunts and gains Protection Up (35%) for 2 turns.

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityNameKey: Ahead of Schedule [c][ffff33](Elite Snowtrooper Commander Only)[-][/c]
dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Snowtrooper Commander (Elite) has a 70% chance to gain 100% Turn Meter after using a Special ability.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy with a 60% chance to Expose them for 2 turns. If the target is Target Locked, they are Exposed again (can't be Resisted).
Dispel Stealth and inflict Target Lock on all enemies for 2 turns and reduce their Turn Meters by 15%. Enemies that become Target Locked also lose another 15% Turn Meter.

Imperial Probe Droid sacrifices itself to deal heavy physical damage to target enemy and additional Physical damage to all other enemies. This attack can't be Evaded. This ability is disabled while Imperial Probe Droid has full Health.

At the end of the Imperial Probe Droid's turn, all other allies gain 15% Turn Meter. In addition, while Imperial Probe Droid is active, Target Locked enemies can't gain Stealth and take bonus damage equal to 5% of their max Health whenever they are damaged by an Empire or Droid ally's attacks.

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityNameKey: Imperial Overwatch [c][ffff33](Elite Imperial Probe Droid Only)[-][/c]
dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: While Imperial Probe Droid (Elite) is active, it removes 20% Turn Meter from debuffed enemies whenever they are damaged by an attack.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack has high damage variance.
Taunt for 2 turns and grant Empire allies Defense Up for 2 turns.
Stormtrooper gains 25% Defense for each living Empire ally.\n\nWhile Stormtrooper is active, Imperial Trooper allies have +30% Defense.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy. If that enemy had full Health, call up to 2 random allies to Assist, dealing 40% less damage.
All allies recover 40% Health, and target ally gains Protection Up (30%) for 2 turns.
Imperial Trooper allies have +30 Speed while they have no debuffs.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and deal 20% more damage for each enemy suffering a debuff. Inflict Tenacity Down for 2 turns on a Critical Hit.
Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 50% chance to inflict Buff Immunity for 2 turns.
At the end of each of his turns, for each debuffed enemy, TIE Fighter Pilot gains 10% Turn Meter and has a 23% chance to gain Foresight for 1 turn.
Deal Physical damage to target enemy and gain 50% Turn Meter.
Dispel all debuffs on another target ally and reduce all of their cooldowns by 2.
At the end of his turn, AT-ST Driver's Cooldown is reduced by 1 for each debuffed ally. If no ally is debuffed, AT-ST Driver gains 15% Turn Meter.

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The following allied abilities and upgrades can be unlocked by completing Platoon Missions.[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey:
[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Deal Special damage to target enemy and Stun them for 1 turn. This ability starts on cooldown. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +20 Cooldown Speed, add 100% Turn Meter reduction 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +30 Cooldown Speed, no longer starts on cooldown

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] The enemy's [c][ffff33]Orbital Bombardment[-][/c] ability is disabled by the [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability in the [c][F0FF23]Rear Trenches[-][/c] and [c][F0FF23]Power Generator[-][/c] territories. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Forward Trenches[-][/c] [-]and[-] [c][F0FF23]Outer Pass[-][/c] territories are protected 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] [c][F0FF23]Snowfields[-][/c] [-]and[-] [c][F0FF23]Forward Stronghold[-][/c] territories are protected

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] Deal Physical damage to all enemies, Dispel all buffs on them and remove 30% Turn Meter. In addition, inflict Defense Down on target enemy for 3 turns. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +35% Damage 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] +30 Cooldown Speed

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] All allies have +25% Defense and a 40% chance to Dispel all debuffs from themselves at the start of their turn. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] +25% Defense and +10% Critical Avoidance 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Add 20% Health recovery per turn and +20% Dispel chance

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] All allies have +10% Critical Chance. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] Add 25% chance to gain Advantage at start of encounter 

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Add 35% chance to Daze target with first attack each encounter

dynamicDescriptionList.textKey: [23C8F5]The following abilities are available to enemy units, but can be weakened or disabled by completing Platoon Missions.[-]

dynamicDescriptionList.abilityDescriptionKey: Deal Physical damage to all enemies with a 75% chance to inflict Ability Block for 1 turn. This ability starts on cooldown. In addition, this ability is disabled in territories protected by the [c][ffff33]Planetary Shield[-][/c] ability.

[c][ffffff]Level 3:[-][/c] Deal Physical damage to target enemy. This attack deals 50% more damage to enemies with full Health. This ability is weakened as platoons attack the AT-AT and is disabled when the AT-AT is defeated. 

[c][ffffff]Level 2:[-][/c] (Hindered) Cooldown Speed -50 

[c][ffffff]Level 1:[-][/c] (Badly Hindered) -35% Damage 

[c][ffffff]Disabled:[-][/c] (AT-AT Destroyed)

localNotificationsList.messageKey: A Territory Battle has just started!
